docs.snippet: Toronto, a team built to win now, still found itself last in the American League East after a recent eight-game winning streak. It has half a season left to fulfill its high expectations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Toronto, a team built to win now, still found itself last in the American League East after a recent eight-game winning streak. It has half a season left to fulfill its high expectations.
docs.abstract: Extra Bases column observes that Toronto Blue Jays, team with big ambitions, still finds itself last in American League East despite eight-game winning streak; Jays have half a season remaining to fulfill high expectations; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Blue Jays Are Beginning to Pick Up the Pieces
headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Are Beginning To Pick Up the Pieces

docs.snippet: While his predecessor, Hillary Rodham Clinton, was a global celebrity, Secretary of State John Kerry is striving to carve out a legacy by taking on some of the world’s intractable problems....
docs.lead_paragraph: While his predecessor, Hillary Rodham Clinton, was a global celebrity, Secretary of State John Kerry is striving to carve out a legacy by taking on some of the world’s intractable problems.
docs.abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry, following global celebrity of his predecessor Hillary Clinton, is striving to carve out his legacy by taking on some of world's intractable problems; is again trying to cobble together effective strategy to end fighting in Syria.

headline.main: Following a Star, Kerry Applies Personal Touch
headline.print_headline: Following a Star, Kerry Applies Personal Touch
